Package com.wallstft.sftp.utils

Class PublicKeyUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wallstft.sftp.utils.PublicKeyUtil
  • public class PublicKeyUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Helpful utilities for Public/Private Key creation and manipulation.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.security.PublicKey decode​(java.lang.String algorithm, java.lang.String base64_encoded)
      This is the generica decode function that is the inverse of the generic encode method.
      static java.security.PublicKey decode_RSA​(java.lang.String RSA_base64_encoded)
      This will decode a Base64 string using the RSA algorithm.
      static java.lang.String encode​(java.security.PublicKey pk)
      This converts the PublicKey into a string for the purposes of serializing to a destination system.

      A generic KeyPair function that allows the user to specify the algorithm and keysize.

      • generate_RSA

        public static java.security.KeyPair generate_RSA()
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Generates an RSA KeyPair with keysize = 1024
        Returns:
        returns the newly generated KeyPair.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • generate

        public static java.security.KeyPair generate​(java.lang.String algorithm,
                                             int keysize)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        A generic KeyPair function that allows the user to specify the algorithm and keysize. This is used by the generate_RSA() function above.
        Parameters:
        algorithm -
        keysize -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • encode

        public static java.lang.String encode​(java.security.PublicKey pk)
        This converts the PublicKey into a string for the purposes of serializing to a destination system.
        Parameters:
        pk - this is the PublicKey that is to be serialized.
        Returns:
        this returns the Base64 encoded string that represents the PublicKey.

      • decode_RSA

        public static java.security.PublicKey decode_RSA​(java.lang.String RSA_base64_encoded)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        This will decode a Base64 string using the RSA algorithm. This is the inverse of the encode_RSA() above.
        Parameters:
        RSA_base64_encoded -
        Returns:
        returns the PublicKey
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • decode

        public static java.security.PublicKey decode​(java.lang.String algorithm,
                                             java.lang.String base64_encoded)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        This is the generica decode function that is the inverse of the generic encode method. The decode and encode functions must use the same algorithm to be successful.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - the algorithm which was used to encode the create the public-key
        base64_encoded - the encoded string
        Returns:
        returns the PublicKey
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
